entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
